pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FrigateFrigate is a tool for automatically generating documentation for your [Helm charts](https://helm.sh/).<!-- TODO: Add badges for CI, PyPI, etc -->Features:- Render documentation from your `Chart.yaml` and `values.yaml` files.- Supports outputting as markdown, reStructuredText and HTML.- Sphinx extension for including in Python documentation.## Installation```$ pip install frigate```## Usage```$ frigate gen path/to/chartChart==========Chart description....```<!-- TODO: Link to docs once set up on RTD -->### Pre-commit-hookInto the repository you want to have the pre-commit hook installed, run:```cat <<EOF >> .pre-commit-config.yaml- repo: https://github.com/rapidsai/frigate rev: v0.4.0 # pre-commit autoupdate - to keep the version up to date hooks: - id: frigateEOF```#### ParametersYou can add extra parameters with :```- repo: https://github.com/rapidsai/frigate rev: v0.4.0 # pre-commit autoupdate - to keep the version up to date hooks: - id: frigate args: - --output=README.rst - --format=rst - --no-credits - --no-deps```
